text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if it isn't Your Majesty! 
Good day to you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I am honoured to have the 
opportunity today to be graced 
by your presence.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I pray from the bottom of my 
heart, that your glory will shine 
for evermore—

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Wait, hold up! One sec! 
What's with the 
formal speak?!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Are you sick? What's 
with the weird words today… 
Huh? Today's…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it's a surprise kingly 
experience for you. 
Happy birthday!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Now, Your Majesty! Your faithful 
servant shall offer a tribute later. 
If there is anything you wish for…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Pfft… Hahaha! I get it now! 
Fuji-san's the best for real!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Thanks! I won't hold back then! 
Anything I want, huh? 
I'll take you up on that!
